name: Initial Consultation
description: Meet with our healthcare provider for a comprehensive health assessment
whatIsIncluded: Medical history review, vital signs check, initial diagnosis discussion

name: Follow-up Visit
description: Return visit to monitor progress and adjust treatment
whatIsIncluded: Progress assessment, vital signs, medication review

name: Physical Examination
description: Comprehensive physical examination by healthcare provider
whatIsIncluded: Full body examination, blood pressure, heart rate, reflex tests
specialPreparation: Come with clean skin, wear comfortable clothing

name: Blood Work & Lab Tests
description: Collection of blood samples for laboratory analysis
specialPreparation: Fasting recommended (8 hours), bring insurance card

name: Vaccination & Immunizations
whatIsIncluded: Vaccine administration, allergy screening, health assessment
specialPreparation: Bring vaccination records, inform of allergies

name: Dermatology Consultation
whatIsIncluded: Skin examination, condition assessment, treatment recommendations
specialPreparation: Come with clean skin, no makeup or lotions

name: Telemedicine Consultation
description: Virtual consultation from home or office
whatIsIncluded: Video consultation, medical advice, prescription if needed
